name: places/ChIJA2HvdZlZwokRnPS0pFzTbqU
formattedAddress: 80 E 11th St #208, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 80 E 11th St #208, New York, NY 10003-6823, USA

originalText.text:
Erika is our family’s go to homeopathy professional. She has always been accessible, patient and understanding.
I recently sought her help in improving my cognitive impairment due to the stroke I suffered 3 years ago.
She was able to identify the right remedy and dosage in couple of calls.
The remedy worked so well that there was a period that I felt as if I never had a stroke.

Erika also helped my wife recover from covid like symptoms in just 3 days! There was a day when we were about to rush to the emergency, but thanks to Erika, she started to feel better in just half hour.

My entire family including my toddler son have been fortunate to have Erika's help for the entire spectrum of illness from mental health to physical health, from depression to cold and flu. I can’t recommend her highly enough.

originalText.text:
Erika knows what she is doing. She has treated my family and me for the last 5 years. She is a knowledgeable homeopath and an attentive listener who is quick to respond and stay in touch when need be. Our children have very good immune systems in many thanks to the great work Erika has done in treating them. For a 5 year old and 3 year old to never have been on antibiotics, says a lot to how well Erika is able to find the right immune-building, health-promoting remedy.
I find New York Homeopathy's office to be clean and professional, and always welcoming. They are also flexible with skype meetings, phone calls or emails in order to allow us to keep appointments or give updates in the event we don't feel so good and can't make it in.
We are a very satisfied family of clients who will continue to go to Erika with whatever ails us for years to come.

originalText.text: Erika has helped me enormously.  I have been wanting to get off medication for several years, but each time I tried I would spiral back into depression.  Thanks to her help I am not only off medication, but feel calmer, more optimistic and am better rested than when I was medicated.  I am so grateful to her.  Also, her office is very centrally located and she is always very responsive when I have a question.

originalText.text: Erika is an exceptional person & a wonderful homeopath!! We have been working with her as a family for several years. She has helped us through both physical & emotional dis-ease. Our initial reason that we came to her was because or 2 year old son at the time suffered from horrible eczema. We had tried everything from topical creams to diet shifts to other alternative approaches. No relief. After an intake with Erika, she prescribed a remedy for him which we gave him. 24 hours later no more eczema!! Never came back. We were sold! We have three children & she helped so much. Highly recommend!!

originalText.text: Erika Simonian has helped me and my two children for many years with much patience and care. Between hormonal changes in myself to battling tough colds and flus with my kids, Erika has helped my family in more ways than one. I can't say enough great things about her and the practice.
